SEARCH
Package Client.View.Cli

Class Cli

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Client.View.View
Client.View.Cli.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteView, Serializable, Remote
public class Cli extends View
This class represents a command-line interface (CLI) for the application. It extends the View class and provides methods for interacting with the user through the command line. The CLI communicates with the LightController and displays the game board, chat messages, and player updates.
See Also:

    • Cli

      public Cli() throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new Cli object. Initializes the mockModel, displays the title, and starts the CLI.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs

  • Method Details

    • askConnection

      public Network askConnection() throws RemoteException
      Asks the user to select a connection protocol (SOCKET or RMI).
      Returns:
      the Network object corresponding to the selected connection protocol
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs

    • askServerPort

      public void askServerPort()
      Asks the user to enter the server address and validates it.

    • askPlayerInfo

      public void askPlayerInfo(List<Map<String,String>> lobbyInfo) throws RemoteException
      Asks the player to enter the lobby ID and their nickname to join the lobby. If the lobby ID is not found, a new lobby will be instantiated.
      Parameters:
      lobbyInfo - the list of lobby information containing lobby and game details
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • askLobbySize

      public void askLobbySize() throws RemoteException
      Asks the player to enter the number of players for the lobby size. The player must enter a number between 2 and 4 (inclusive).
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
